job.title: Senior Software Engineer | Payments | Fintech
job.description: pstronguSenior Software Engineer  Core Payments  Leading FinTech  Austin TexasustrongppbrppAre you an Experienced Software Engineer that wants to make a meaningful impact in an organizationppbrppAre you interested in working in a banking organization that works more like a tech innovation org compared to a traditional bankppbrppAre you looking to work in an Agile environment with a clear career progressionppnbspppMy Client a Leading Fintech Organization based in San Francisco are looking to grow their Core Payments tech teams with both Principal and Senior fullstack software engineers with both Java and JavaScript ReactJS in Austin TexasppbrppThe ideal person should have the necessary skills and experience to provide technical guidance estimation of efforts understanding and decide upon the optimal technology solution to achieve the desired business needsppbrppstronguYou will ideally haveustrongppbrpulli5 yearsnbspof development experience as anbspSoftware EngineerliliHandson development experience innbspstrongJava J2EE Spring Bootstrong etcliliA deep fascination of building elegant maintainable welldocumented secure code  Abstracting and refactoring should be a passion not a choreliliExperience withnbspTDDnbspandnbspCICDliliExperience with strongJavaScript ReactJSstrong HTML CSS etcliliExperience with distributed systems and withnbspstrongMicroservicesstrongnbsparchitectureliulpbrppThis is an excellent opportunity to work with a leading and highly respected Financial Organization which are going through a vast and fascinating digital transformationppbrppThey have multiple office locations across the USA and can work on a Hybrid Model although all interviews are currently fully remoteppbrppExcellent salary bonus and benefits on offerppbrppstrongemSend in your details ASAP to find out more and receive a full job specificationemstrongp
